title: Available 1x1 Home in a Pet-Friendly Community! Move in special
posting_body: The next place you’ll call home could be this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment from Clayton Gardens!
Check out some of the great features of this home such as a charming kitchen that includes a dishwasher for easier cleanup.
The apartment also has ceiling fans and air conditioning installed, so you can be more comfortable during the hotter days of the year.
Closets in the bedroom come with mirrored doors that make them look elegant.
You also get to have your own balcony that gives you a nice view of the city.
Clayton Gardens is a controlled access community.
Residents enjoy great amenities such as a fitness center for the health conscious, a clubhouse where you can mingle with your neighbors, and elevators for your convenience.
Get $1000 off your first month rent when you lease with in 48 hours of your tour at Clayton Gardens.
